mcq.statement: A certain gas process ends in its original thermodynamics state. Of the following, which is possible as the net result of the process?

options.a: The gas does no work but loses 50 joule of energy as heat
options.b: The gas absorbs 50 J of energy as heat and does 50 J of work
options.c: It is adiabatic and the gas does 50 J of work
